page.title: 11An Everyday Garton Family
page.content: Mr and Mrs H. have lived in Garton for thirteen years. They have 2 children. Mr H. is a self employed stress welder and Mrs H. owns a shop which also includes the post office. Mr and Mrs H. own a lot of pets and they have a half acre vegetable garden.Mr H. enjoys sub-aqua diving while Mrs H. is a keen gardener. They are satisfied with their rural lifestyle and dislike towns and cities.Mrs H.uses her own shop but also shops in Driffield and Hull. They are concerned about rising crime, their children and good health. They hope the future will bring continued peace and contentment. Mr H. believes that you only get out of life what you put into it.
